title: AI for Data Management Planning
section: Writing NIH Data Management and Sharing Plans
text:
Writing NIH Data Management and Sharing Plans

Writing data management plans can be time consuming
Both the format and contents are often unfamiliar
Can Versa write an NIH-compliant data management and sharing plan?
I entered a (very) brief overview of a clinical project
Shared that I wanted to use Vivli as my repository

title: AI for Data Management Planning
section: Bigger Challenge: Can AI help carry out the plan?
text:
Bigger Challenge: Can AI help carry out the plan?

creating systems to manage data - suggesting tools and workflows?
preparing data for sharing - adding metadata, anonymizing data, etc
uploading data to a repository?
